history.proof: intros x1 x2 xs1 xs2 H Himp. revert x1 x2 xs2 H Himp. induction xs1. - intros. simpl. sauto lq: on depth: 3use: Build_Monotonicity. - sauto q: on depth: 3use: Build_Monotonicity.

original: intros x1 x2 xs1 xs2 H Himp. revert x1 x2 xs2 H Himp. induction xs1. - intros. simpl. auto. - intros. simpl. inversion H; subst. inversion Himp; subst. apply Build_Monotonicity in Mono. specialize (IHxs1 xs2 H3 H7).
